title: Elegant Colonial Mansion Stay with Cooking Class & Nightly Cocktails in Luang Prabang
description: Discover the timeless beauty of Laos with a sophisticated stay in a century-old colonial mansion. Explore the ancient Buddhist temples and charming local villages of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Luang Prabang while staying at the five-star Sofitel Luang Prabang, enjoying daily breakfast, a traditional cooking class, an exotic dining experience at 3 Nagas Restaurant where you can sample authentic Lao cuisine, a daily cocktail and a lavish afternoon tea. Plus indulge in a relaxing 60-minute massage each, a foot ritual on arrival, airport transfers and more.

title: Luang Prabang: Luxury Colonial Mansion Stay with Nightly Drinks
description: Discover the timeless beauty of Laos and explore the ancient Buddhist temples and charming local villages of UNESCO World Heritage-listed Luang Prabang while staying in five-star luxury at Sofitel Luang Prabang. Your package includes daily breakfast, a traditional cooking class, an exotic dinner at Governor's Grill, where you can sample fresh farm-to-table cuisine, a daily cocktail and a lavish afternoon tea. Plus indulge in a relaxing 60-minute massage each, a foot ritual on arrival, airport transfers and more.
offer_address: Unit 4, Ban Mano, Luang Prabang, Laos

title: Be Amongst the First to Experience Luang Prabang’s Largest New Resort
description: Experience some of the finest resort facilities in the UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Luang Prabang at the brand-new Pullman Luang Prabang - a resort nestled amidst 16 lush hectares, paddy fields, mountains and ponds. Uncover crumbling temples, vibrant street markets and stunning landscapes in this ancient capital. Your escape includes daily breakfast, an indulgent five-course dinner, an afternoon tea experience, massages, return airport transfers and much more.
offer_address: Ban Pong Wanh, Luang Prabang 06000, Laos

title: Tranquil Rosewood Retreat with Authentic Laos Dining Experiences
description: Experience the beauty and culture of Laos with a getaway at Rosewood Luang Prabang, a stunning oasis surrounded by lush tropical greenery. Escape tourist crowds and embrace a luxurious Rosewood stay with a luxurious 60-minute massage, an authentic Laotian cooking class, a decadent three-course dinner, daily breakfast and return transfers from Luang Prabang Airport.

title: Authentic Laos Escape with Gourmet Dining & Cultural Experiences Included
description: Discover the magic of Laos when you spend four nights at the Belmond La Résidence Phou Vao, located in the UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Luang Prabang. Uncover ancient temples, vibrant street markets and stunning landscapes while enjoying daily breakfast, one three-course lunch and one three-course dinner, a daily cocktail each, one relaxing 60-minute massage per person, plus an unforgettable sunset cruise on the Mekong River, traditional alms giving experience and return airport transfers for two.

title: Signature Belmond Luxury in Laos
description: Discover the magic of Laos when you spend four nights at the Belmond La Residence Phou Vao, located in the UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Luang Prabang. Uncover ancient temples, vibrant street markets and stunning landscapes while enjoying daily breakfasts, two three-course dinners, nightly cocktails, a relaxing 60-minutes massage each, plus an unforgettable sunset cruise on the Mekong River, traditional alms giving experience and return airport transfers for two.
location_description: Belmond La Residence Phou Vao OLD

title: French Elegance in Luang Prabang
description: Discover the timeless beauty of Laos with a privileged stay in a century-old colonial mansion. Explore the ancient Buddhist temples and charming local villages of the UNESCO World-Heritage town of Luang Prabang while staying at the sophisticated five-star Sofitel Luang Prabang, enjoying daily breakfast, a sumptuous afternoon tea, a traditional cooking class and an exotic dining experience. Plus indulge in a relaxing 60-minute massage each, a foot ritual on arrival, airport transfers and more.

title: Laos: Boutique Luxury Near UNESCO-Listed Luang Prabang
description: Experience the ancient Buddhist temples, street food markets, charming local villages and natural wonders of Laos’ UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Luang Prabang staying at the cities #1 top-rated hotel. Enjoy four nights of boutique luxury at Luang Say Residence with return airport transfers, daily breakfasts, exotic dining experiences, an elephant feeding session and waterfall excursion, daily afternoon tea and more.

vendor_name: Homm Souvannaphoum Luang Prabang (Formally Maison Souvannaphoum Hotel)
title: Laos Boutique Hotel in the Heart of Luang Prabang
description:
Gaze across lush green mountains while absorbing the soothing jungle atmosphere at the boutique Homm Souvannaphoum Luang Prabang - a luxurious oasis in the heart of Luang Prabang, less than a kilometre's walk to the town centre. Begin your day with a round of petanque or morning yoga before sampling delicious cuisine at the hotel's Elephant Blanc restaurant. Set yourself up with a book and a drink by the lounger-lined pool, indulge at the expansive spa (charges apply) or maintain your exercise routine at the sleek fitness centre.

Enjoy the best of the region, with bicycles available for guests to explore the nearby Mount Phousi, or call on the expertise of staff, who can assist with booking a tour or reserving a private transfer. An unmissable sight within close reach is Kuang Si Falls, located within a 45-minute drive. Round out your day among the vibrant colours of the bustling local night markets, experiencing them from a uniquely local perspective with your night-market companion, courtesy of the hotel.
offer_address: Rue Chao Fa Ngum, Thatluang village, Luang Prabang district, Luang Prabang province, Laos

title: Laos Colonial-Heritage Mansion Stay in Luang Prabang with Spa & Cocktail Bar
description:
Step into the heart of Luang Prabang’s UNESCO-listed Old Town, where French colonial elegance meets traditional Lao heritage in a collection of century-old teakwood houses. Wander to the nearby Wat Xieng Thong, the city’s most revered temple, or stroll along the Mekong and Khan rivers, where saffron-robed monks pass by each morning during the alms-giving ritual.

Dine beneath lantern-lit trees at the hotel’s celebrated restaurant, serving refined Laotian cuisine crafted from local produce. Savour artisanal cocktails at the Nagini Bar or treat yourself to a relaxing treatment at Le Spa.
location_description: 3 Nagas Hotel Luang Prabang - MGallery Collection
offer_address: Vat Nong Village, Luang Prabang 06000, Laos

title: Five-Star Laos Tranquility in the Heart of World Heritage-Listed Luang Prabang with Daily Breakfast
description: Experience quiet luxury among storied temples at the five-star Avani+ Luang Prabang Hotel. Spend breezy days by the pool bar sipping modern cocktails infused with traditional Laotian spirits, indulging in spicy papaya salads at the onsite restaurant or visiting the town’s most picturesque attractions via the hotel’s complimentary shuttle service. While monks file past on their alms rounds, you can find soothing serenity at the Anantara Spa.
offer_address: Ban Hua Xieng, Setthathirath Road, Hua Xieng Village, Town Center, Luang Prabang, Lao PDR 06000, Laos
